channel.title: blogRS - not yet into development, need feedback before I start. (If i should)
channel.description:
I have this idea. Where, you sign up, like a RS account diary. Post achievements, goals, statistics, anything imaginable about your account.
I need feedback though, would you guys use it? It would have PHP dynamic signatures like draynor does where you can add it to your signature (goals and what not).
Just a summer project i might look further into, bored and free time only.
Whatdoyathink?
Need criticism please.
Oh, and if it's in the wrong section, please move. Sorry if it is.

item.title: blogRS - not yet into development, need feedback before I start. (If i should)
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]sagi; i can make you the signature generator (compatible with your highscores)
if you have the image already[/quote]
Yes! I’ll start on the images, I only have one ready atm.

Read full topic

I need feedback though, would you guys use it? It would have PHP dynamic signatures like draynor does where you can add it to your signature (goals and what not).

Yes, for both. But, can you make the signatures now? I have signatures, but I was too lazy to do the draynor way. And make a tutorial for it?
